column2:
"<%me>.
Are you okay?"
"Another sound? Again, nothing on my end..."
"Aha! <%me>! There's something there!"
"What is it? It looks man-made."
"An ARKS relic? No, surely that can't be right."

"Looking at the parameters... it seems like a weapon?
But the shape seems off. Is it broken?"
"<%me>, are you okay? Who was that?"
"Let go of that!"

"That was a close call,
<%me>!"
"My heart was pounding, just following you. What's going on here?"
"Is he an ARKS member?"
"Looking that up is your job, right?"
"Hmph... scanning the database"
"There's no matching data...? Huh? What's that about?"
"No need to get upset, Echo. He must have come from somewhere."
"Hey you! Who are you? Where are you from?"
"You're going to ignore me? And that stupid mask... it's like you're trying to tick me off."
"Interfere and I'll kill you."
"So that's how it's gonna be? Guess we're going to have to beat the info out of you!"
